name: Private Hue Imperial City Tour Full Day
description: Hue was once the capital of Vietnam and now listed as a World Heritage Site. Sitting on the banks of the delightful Perfume River, the Complex of Hue Monuments is an unique construction of a planned and fully defended feudal capital city in Southeast Asia. Many of the sites can be reached by river and this makes an romantic way to see the city. Hue City Tour brings to you a closer look on many historic site and the cultural background of this charming city.
